import React, { Component } from 'react' import classNames from 'classnames' export default class LoginForm extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { active:"login", firstrName:"", lastName:"", login:"", password:"", onLogin:props.onLogin, onRegister:props.onRegister } } onChangeHandler = (e) => { let name = e.target.name let value = e.target.value this.setState({[name]:value}) } onSubmitLogin= (e) => { this.state.login(e,this.state.login,this.state.password) } onSubmitRegister = (e) => { this.state.onRegister( e, this.state.firstrName, this.state.lastName, this.state.login, this.state.password ) } render() { return (
) } }
